languages.text: "Я видел многое, Вольный Торговец. В том числе и мутации, вызванные колдовстом {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g}. И больше всего меня пугает не их уродливая форма, а то, что под ней скрывается". {n}Хейнрикс морщится.{/n} "Человеческая душа, испытывающая муки. Хаос никогда не забывает оставить своим жертвам способность мучиться".

traits.locale_text: "Я видел многое, Вольный Торговец. В том числе и мутации, вызванные колдовстом {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g}. И больше всего меня пугает не их уродливая форма, а то, что под ней скрывается". {n}Хейнрикс морщится.{/n} "Человеческая душа, испытывающая муки. Хаос никогда не забывает оставить своим жертвам способность мучиться".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I have seen a great deal, Rogue Trader. That includes mutations caused by the sorcery of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. But what frightens me most is not their repulsive form, but what is hiding beneath it." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "A human soul in torment. Chaos never forgets to ensure its victims retain the ability to suffer."
languages.original_text: "Я видел многое, Вольный Торговец. В том числе и мутации, вызванные колдовстом {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g}. И больше всего меня пугает не их уродливая форма, а то, что под ней скрывается". {n}Хейнрикс морщится.{/n} "Человеческая душа, испытывающая муки. Хаос никогда не забывает оставить своим жертвам способность мучиться".

Chaos never forgets to ensure its victims retain the ability to suffer."

But what frightens me most is not their repulsive form, but what is hiding beneath it." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "A human soul in torment. Chaos never forgets to ensure its victims retain the ability to suffer."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我见过很多这样的东西，行商浪人，其中包括由{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}巫术制造的变异怪物。但最令我恐惧的，并不是这种怪物令人厌恶的肉体，而是隐藏在肉体之下的东西。”{n}海因里希皱起了眉。{/n}“那是饱受折磨的人类灵魂。混沌始终会确保它的受害者保留感受痛苦的能力。”
languages.original_text: "I have seen a great deal, Rogue Trader. That includes mutations caused by the sorcery of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. But what frightens me most is not their repulsive form, but what is hiding beneath it." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "A human soul in torment. Chaos never forgets to ensure its victims retain the ability to suffer."

traits.locale_text: “我见过很多这样的东西，行商浪人，其中包括由{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}巫术制造的变异怪物。但最令我恐惧的，并不是这种怪物令人厌恶的肉体，而是隐藏在肉体之下的东西。”{n}海因里希皱起了眉。{/n}“那是饱受折磨的人类灵魂。混沌始终会确保它的受害者保留感受痛苦的能力。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «He visto muchas cosas, Comerciante Independiente. Eso incluye las mutaciones causadas por la hechicería del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g}. Lo que más me preocupa no es su forma repugnante, sino lo que se oculta tras ella». {n}Heinrix frunce el ceño.{/n} «Un alma humana atormentada. El Caos siempre se asegura de que sus víctimas conservan la capacidad de sufrir».
languages.original_text: "I have seen a great deal, Rogue Trader. That includes mutations caused by the sorcery of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. But what frightens me most is not their repulsive form, but what is hiding beneath it." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "A human soul in torment. Chaos never forgets to ensure its victims retain the ability to suffer."

traits.locale_text: «He visto muchas cosas, Comerciante Independiente. Eso incluye las mutaciones causadas por la hechicería del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g}. Lo que más me preocupa no es su forma repugnante, sino lo que se oculta tras ella». {n}Heinrix frunce el ceño.{/n} «Un alma humana atormentada. El Caos siempre se asegura de que sus víctimas conservan la capacidad de sufrir».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者よ、我は多くのものを見てきたのです。{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}の魔術による変異も含めて。だが、我が最も恐れているのは、連中の吐き気を催すような姿ではなく、その下に隠れているものなのだ」{n}ハインリックスは顔をしかめる。{/n}「苦悩する人間の魂。渾沌は、犠牲者が苦しむような能力を必ず残すのですよ」
languages.original_text: "I have seen a great deal, Rogue Trader. That includes mutations caused by the sorcery of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. But what frightens me most is not their repulsive form, but what is hiding beneath it." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "A human soul in torment. Chaos never forgets to ensure its victims retain the ability to suffer."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者よ、我は多くのものを見てきたのです。{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}の魔術による変異も含めて。だが、我が最も恐れているのは、連中の吐き気を催すような姿ではなく、その下に隠れているものなのだ」{n}ハインリックスは顔をしかめる。{/n}「苦悩する人間の魂。渾沌は、犠牲者が苦しむような能力を必ず残すのですよ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe sehr viel gesehen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Dazu gehören auch Mutationen durch die Zauber des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Aber nicht ihr abstoßendes Äußeres macht mir Angst, sondern das, was sich darunter verbirgt." {n}Heinrix verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Eine gequälte menschliche Seele. Das Chaos vergisst nie, dafür zu sorgen, dass seine Opfer weiterhin leiden können."
languages.original_text: "I have seen a great deal, Rogue Trader. That includes mutations caused by the sorcery of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. But what frightens me most is not their repulsive form, but what is hiding beneath it." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "A human soul in torment. Chaos never forgets to ensure its victims retain the ability to suffer."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe sehr viel gesehen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Dazu gehören auch Mutationen durch die Zauber des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Aber nicht ihr abstoßendes Äußeres macht mir Angst, sondern das, was sich darunter verbirgt." {n}Heinrix verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Eine gequälte menschliche Seele. Das Chaos vergisst nie, dafür zu sorgen, dass seine Opfer weiterhin leiden können."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai vu beaucoup de choses au cours de ma carrière, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Ce n'est pas la première fois que je suis confronté à des mutations causées par la sorcellerie du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Cependant, ce qui m'effraie le plus n'est pas leur apparence répugnante, mais ce qu'elle cache : une âme humaine tourmentée, {n}explique Heinrix en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Le Chaos veille toujours à ce que ses victimes restent capables de souffrir. »
languages.original_text: "I have seen a great deal, Rogue Trader. That includes mutations caused by the sorcery of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. But what frightens me most is not their repulsive form, but what is hiding beneath it." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "A human soul in torment. Chaos never forgets to ensure its victims retain the ability to suffer."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai vu beaucoup de choses au cours de ma carrière, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Ce n'est pas la première fois que je suis confronté à des mutations causées par la sorcellerie du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Cependant, ce qui m'effraie le plus n'est pas leur apparence répugnante, mais ce qu'elle cache : une âme humaine tourmentée, {n}explique Heinrix en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Le Chaos veille toujours à ce que ses victimes restent capables de souffrir. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Çok şey gördüm Hür Tacir. Buna, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos{/g} sahirliğiyle mutasyona uğramış varlıklar da dâhil. Fakat beni en çok korkutan, itici görünüşlerinden ziyade bünyelerinde gizledikleri." {n}Heinrix, yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "İşkence gören insan ruhları. Kaos, kurbanlarının acı çekme kabiliyetini daima korumaya özen gösterir."
languages.original_text: "I have seen a great deal, Rogue Trader. That includes mutations caused by the sorcery of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. But what frightens me most is not their repulsive form, but what is hiding beneath it." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "A human soul in torment. Chaos never forgets to ensure its victims retain the ability to suffer."

traits.locale_text: “Çok şey gördüm Hür Tacir. Buna, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos{/g} sahirliğiyle mutasyona uğramış varlıklar da dahil. Fakat beni en çok korkutan, itici görünüşlerinden ziyade bünyelerinde gizledikleridir.” {n}Heinrix, yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} “İşkence gören bir insan ruhu. Kaos, kurbanlarının acı çekme kabiliyetini daima korumaya özen gösterir.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
